questions.quote: There's girls everywhere.  I go out of my apartment, there's girls in the elevator.  They're in cafeterias, subways, so what?
Well... what if you showed up bad naked, huh? You still got that belt sander?
Oh, George, have you seen the American league directory? It is a big green book. Oh, thanks kiddo.
Yes you do, Biff. You've never been to a Flea Market, and you think they have fleas there.
Her assistant caught me. And now I'm probably not going to get a job. He's going to tell Landis that I was sneakin around her office.
Alright, there you go. She's gonna get the jacket back.  So, let's go get some coffee, huh?
Wait a second, wait a second. We could work out a little deal here.
He's acting very strangely. I think he started drinking again.
Girls.  There's girls right here in the store.  Look, look, there's one over there.  Look, there's another one.  Soon as I walk outside there'll be girls out there.  What's the matter?
Look, I'm sorry, Puddy. It-it was a mistake. So, let's just put it behind us, and we can continue like this never happened.
